name: Federal obligations to University Affiliated Research Centers, by type of R&D and R&D plant: FY 2021
description: Federal obligations to University Affiliated Research Centers, by type of R&D and R&D plant: FY 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_total_r_d_and_r_d_plant
variableMeasured.description: Total R D And R D Plant

variableMeasured.name: field_type_of_r_d_total_r_d
variableMeasured.description: Type Of R D Total R D

variableMeasured.name: field_type_of_r_d_basic_research
variableMeasured.description: Type Of R D Basic Research

variableMeasured.name: field_type_of_r_d_applied_research
variableMeasured.description: Type Of R D Applied Research

variableMeasured.name: field_type_of_r_d_experimental_development
variableMeasured.description: Type Of R D Experimental Development

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Because of rounding, detail may not add to total. UARCs are research organizations within a university or college that are established by the Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Research and Engineering to provide or maintain essential engineering, research, and development capabilities through a long-term strategic relationship. FY 2021 obligations include additional funding provided by supplemental COVID-19 pandemic-related appropriations (e.g., Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security [CARES] Act). See technical table A-2 for additional notes associated with the agencies listed in this table.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development, FYs 2021–22.
